channel.title: How do I edit a client to work with me?
channel.description: I downloaded the Unholy Blitz client and server. I don't know how to edit the client to work with my server? I know you have to change files but which ones? Also, I want to edit my Server to say Ps3 Scape instead of Blitz or whatever. Can someone please help or get on Teamviewer and show?

item.title: How do I edit a client to work with me?
item.dc:creator: @x_vain_x x vain x
item.description:
@x_vain_x wrote:

To make it run with yours you have to change the gui.java and put ur ip into it.
And to make it say your server name you have to go into client.java and depending on the client version there in diffrent places.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit a client to work with me?
